author: Claire W
title: Great Location, Great Room, and Great Staff!
text:
You can find a walk around Tour of our stay in The Bowery on our Youtube channel 007inDubai.
We stayed for 5 days over New Year's and The Bowery really made our time in New York special.
From the greeting as we arrived, where the lovely front of house staff gave us some tips for breakfast places before our room was ready, to the ever attentive housekeeping, the service at The Bowery is amazing!
We booked a King Room which had the most unbelievable view of the Financial district with some crazy sunsets! The room was spacious enough with some lovely little details such as the Bowery Bear (we really regret not purchasing one to bring home) the old fashioned bathroom with the super warm and powerful shower, and the old paned windows that framed photos of the city beautifully,
We had a great time in the evenings relaxing by the fire in the bar and chatting with the bar staff who are the life and soul of the party! We even saw Adam Levine in there one evening, we hear The Bowery is quite the celebrity haunt!
The location is ideal for exploring SoHo and surrounding areas, it's also an awesome spot to check out all the great food places in the area.
Overall if you're looking for a quirky boutique hotel with that 5* service you would get in a well known chain, this is the hotel for you. I will be recommending it over and over again to anyone travelling to New York to explore the city.
Room Tip: Ask for a room facing the Financial district See more room tips
